main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing luminous, oval-shaped objects flying at approximately 5,000 feet over Uniontown, Pennsylvania, on June 29, 1948.
interesting points: The sighting included three objects observed at intervals of approximately five minutes,Each object was seen for around 10 seconds and appeared to be traveling very fast,The objects left a trail of light behind them,The weather at the time included stormy conditions with lightning,There were multiple witnesses including civilians and police officers who reported the sighting.
witness description: civilians including a police sergeant and his daughter
